title: Bug 6304: Unable to synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
EB: Expect the synchronization process to successfully update both the selected .java file and the associated resource (e.g., .properties file) in the package viewer.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.
